name: cooksconverter
0:
”Alexa, open cooks converter”
”Alexa, ask cooks converter to convert three hundred grams dry bread crumbs to u.k. cup.”
”Alexa, ask cooks converter if it can convert flour”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cooks converter
des:
The purpose of this app is to help people cooking international recipes to convert measurements to their local measurement units.

 The app allows users to swap, for example, between US cups and grams, to create a seamless transferal tool. 

It is a great addition to any kitchen Alexa and helps enhance your baking and cooking experience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
